title: creators struggle to run their businesses

children.string: In todayâ€™s digital economy, creators / publishers struggle to break through the noise, connect with & grow an audience & be rewarded fairly for their creativity.
**Ownership -** Lack of ownership & control over your data / channel / audience / profile / platform / experience.
**Monetization -** Lack of in-built business models - be rewarded fairly for the value you create. No incremental monetization / donations / microtransactions / profit share / reward pools.
**No solid foundation -** Uncertainty & fear - deplatforming / demonetization / censorship / shadow banning / algo manipulation / platforms changing the rules.

**Reach & distribution -** Creators struggle to break through and grow an audience (find your 1000 true fans) - High barrier to entry. Time-consuming to reach a living. Reliant on likes / engagement / retweets & attention economy metrics.
